bug.author: 1Upper
bug.summary: Error as opening TFJS example with safari browser on iPhone 8 and iPhone X
bug.description: The following TFJS example doesn't work with iPhone 8 or iPhone X. The Safari browser actively crashes during training. <denchmark-link:https://storage.googleapis.com/tfjs-examples/mnist-core/dist/index>https://storage.googleapis.com/tfjs-examples/mnist-core/dist/index</denchmark-link> . Is TFJS model training/fine tuning supported by Safari browser on iOS? Browser: Safari browser iOS version: iOS 13

comments.comment: Generally speaking, yes training is supported, this might possibly be due to some recentish update in safari. I can reproduce this, so will take a look at this when we get a chance.
Hey there, I saw this issue happens on latest iOS 13.1.2 too. Have you got a chance to look at it? Thanks!
Closing this due to lack of activity, feel to reopen. Thank you
